quest.name: In Soroban We Trust
journal: Soroban is about to show you a shining, shimmering, splendid new world.

The requisite items have been gathered and given to Soroban, and so he invites you to join him at the western edge of Tamamizu. There, where the water twists and turns on the surface of the dome, he will perform the ritual to let you traverse the depths as easily as any Kojin, that you might begin your search for the Yasakani–no–Magatama.

The deep, booming voice of Soroban resounds in your ears as he intones a sacred prayer to the kami of the deep. With a flash of light, it is done, and you are told you can breathe underwater as you would on land. Alisaie's skepticism turns to amazement once she passes through the portal and finds herself in open water, completely at ease. Yet that is not all, for Soroban then summons for you noble steeds of great strength. And so, with the aid of the striped rays, you embark on your journey to Sui–no–Sato.
It is not long before you arrive at your destination─the underwater village of the Raen. But will these reclusive people be willing to aid your cause?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Quite how this blessing is supposed to keep us from drowning remains to be seen...

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: Are you ready, my friends, to explore a world unlike any you have ever known?

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: Then let us go to western part of the village, where the water twists and turns, and there complete our preparations for the ritual.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: This is the place, right? Hmm... I'm not sure I like the look of that whirlpool...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: He dove into the water a moment ago and said to wait here until he returned...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Owing to Soroban's blessing, you may now dive into deep water and stay submerged indefinitely.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Underwater settlements like Tamamizu and Sui–no–Sato can be accessed via circular portals.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To leave deep water, you need only swim towards the surface. Conversely, to dive into deep water while swimming on the surface, press [Ctrl+Spacebar][???].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should you become separated from your steed, speak with Soroban in Tamamizu to mount a striped ray.

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: Were you thrown from your ray? No matter! I shall summon another─assuming that is your wish?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'll admit I had my doubts, but this is a “blessing” worthy of the name. One cannot help wondering what other magicks the Kojin possess...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: This must be Sui–no–Sato, the Raen village Soroban told us about.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Right, then! Let's see if they can't help us find the Kojin's missing jewel!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may now perform underwater emotes!
